content: this pattern is free on my blog or you can purchase the pdf here the greyson baby cardigan is cute unisex and the perfect gift when paired with the greyson baby blanket - or on its own this sweet little crochet baby cardigan comes in 3 sizes and can be customized for both boys and girls - just move the button band to the other front flap and sew the buttons on the other side to be fair i don t think most new parents pay too much attention to that sort of thing but this free crochet pattern has you covered either way
